title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3213/83 of 15 November 1983 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2603/71 on detailed rules for the conclusion of contracts for first processing and market preparation of tobacco held by intervention agencies
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3213/83
of 15 November 1983
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2603/71 on detailed rules for the conclusion of contracts for first processing and market preparation of tobacco held by intervention agencies
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 2603/71 is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 November 1983.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 94, 28. 4. 1970, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 164, 14. 6. 1982, p. 27.
(3) OJ No L 39, 17. 2. 1971, p. 3.
(4) OJ No L 269, 8. 12. 1971, p. 11.
(5) OJ No L 272, 26. 9. 1981, p. 1.
